nodes.text: A thornsuckle plant was a species of extremely poisonous plant found in the galaxy. During the Imperial Era, the thornsuckle was believed to be extinct, but a sample was found by the Mandragonian Mob, who intended to clone it and create a bioweapon which would poison the atmospheres of planets. However, the thornsuckle sample was destroyed by Mahjo Reeloo with a defoliator bomb.
The thornsuckle plant first appeared in the canon junior novel Pirate's Price, which was written by Lou Anders and published in 2019.
